data.title: Midterms
data.content: Midterms will start on 10/1 at noon, and students will have 24 hours to complete

data.title: Thanksgiving
data.content: There will be no class the week of Thanksgiving, but remember to study for the exam on Monday, 11/28

data.title: Finals
data.content: There will be no final for this class. The final project will be the final exam grade
